alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Jackson; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 06 at 5:54AM MDT until October 06 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Ziebach County, Haakon County and Northern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM MDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
